name: Totally ordered multicast
description: Implementation of a totally ordered multicast (TOM) library. Features a messaging layer on top of java.nio and a higher level of TOM callback to be used in a non-blocking way inside a project.

name: MitM attacks against HTTPS over public wifi networks
description: Feasibility study, and implementation of attacks on HTTPS traffic over public wifi networks. Study of the consequences for the users' data and privacy.
